constuctors.name: Document
constuctors.description: Creates a new instance of the Dom.Document class.

methods.name: createRootElement
methods.signature: public Dom.XmlNode createRootElement(String name, String namespace, String prefix)
methods.description: Creates the top-level root element for a document.

methods.name: getRootElement
methods.description: Returns the top-level root element node in the document. If this method returns null, the root element has not been created yet.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Parse the XML representation of the document specified in the xml argument and load it into a document.

methods.name: toXmlString
methods.description: Returns the XML representation of the document as a String.
